title: 189: Rob Bell is Back (with His Son)!
itunes:title: 189: Rob Bell is Back (with His Son)!
description:
Everything is spiritual and Rob Bell is back, broads! And this time he brought his son Trace with him! In this episode, we get personal and we discuss spirit, shame, Rob’s history as a “megachurch” pastor, knowing when to walk away, how to answer the “BIG” questions for your kids and when you should answer them, processing through current circumstances, joy, some quantum physics, Rob’s latest book “Everything Is Spiritual”, and much more! 


Both Bekah and Jess read “Everything Is Spiritual” and cannot recommend it enough - especially right now. 


PURCHASE OPTIONS FOR “EVERYTHING IS SPIRITUAL” HERE: https://robbell.com/portfolio/everything-is-spiritual/


ONLINE BOOK TOUR: https://robbell.com/portfolio/everything-is-spiritual-bookstore-tour/


ROB BELL’S PODCAST “The RobCast": https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-robcast/id956742638


ALL OTHER INFO: https://robbell.com/


FOLLOW ROB: @realrobbell


FOLLOW TRACE ON TWITTER AND INSTA: @tracebelll


REGISTER TO VOTE HERE: https://vote.gov/


CHECK TO SEE IF YOU ARE REGISTERED HERE: https://www.vote.org/am-i-registered-to-vote/


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS AND THEIR DEALS:


THRIVE MARKET - Thrivemarket.com/CHATTY

FAB FIT FUN - www.fabfitfun.com code: CHATTY

NATIVE - NativeDEO.com/CHATTY

FUNCTION OF BEAUTY - Functionofbeauty.com/BROADS

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
